original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像3
overview: Tunnels that disappeared from maps that are not reflected on GPS. What lies beyond? It is said that an eerie image was captured while exploring the ruins of the "factory site". This factory is more than just an abandoned building, it's also famous for being the site of a murder...
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 3
